title: Multiple Game queues? What do you think?
body:
Here is a concept to think about. 
Is there any opportunity to have multiple queues active?
Queues can be pretty long at times. Imagine if you could be in a queue for a normal game and a ARAM at the same time?
I just want to play sometimes and I don't care what type it is. Whatever game I get into I could join instead of cancelling trying to get int he queue with the least amount of time.
Feedback would be great.

replies.body: I worry about people getting the queue up and then saying "Nah, I change my mind on this game type."
That happens currently, even with only 1 queue. I love this idea, it should definitely be implemented.
